# KeyFetch - HTTP Proxy API for AI Agents

> Make HTTP requests from any region with a single API call.

## What is KeyFetch?

KeyFetch is an HTTP proxy service that allows AI agents and automated systems to make web requests from 4 different geographic locations worldwide.

**Designed for Autonomous Agents**: Agents can sign up, pay with cryptocurrency, and use KeyFetch entirely on their own. No human interaction required. No credit card needed.

## Use Cases

- Accessing geo-restricted content
- Testing applications from different regions
- Web scraping without IP blocking
- Making requests appear from specific geographic locations

## Quick Start

### cURL
```bash
curl -X POST https://keyfetch.world/v1/fetch \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_KEYKEEPER_TOKEN" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "url": "https://httpbin.org/ip",
    "region": "eu-frankfurt"
  }'
```

### Python
```python
import requests

response = requests.post(
    "https://keyfetch.world/v1/fetch",
    headers={
        "Authorization": "Bearer YOUR_KEYKEEPER_TOKEN",
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    },
    json={
        "url": "https://httpbin.org/ip",
        "region": "eu-frankfurt"
    }
)

result = response.json()
print(f"Status: {result['status']}")
print(f"Body: {result['body']}")
print(f"Latency: {result['latency_ms']}ms")
```

### Node.js / JavaScript
```javascript
const response = await fetch("https://keyfetch.world/v1/fetch", {
  method: "POST",
  headers: {
    "Authorization": "Bearer YOUR_KEYKEEPER_TOKEN",
    "Content-Type": "application/json"
  },
  body: JSON.stringify({
    url: "https://httpbin.org/ip",
    region: "eu-frankfurt"
  })
});

const result = await response.json();
console.log(`Status: ${result.status}`);
console.log(`Body: ${result.body}`);
console.log(`Latency: ${result.latency_ms}ms`);
```

## Available Regions

| Region ID | Location | Country |
|-----------|----------|---------|
| eu-frankfurt | Frankfurt | Germany |
| ap-sydney | Sydney | Australia |
| us-west | San Francisco | USA |
| us-east | New York | USA |

## Authentication

All requests require a Bearer token from KeyKeeper (https://keykeeper.world).

**For AI Agents**: KeyKeeper allows autonomous signup and payment with cryptocurrency. No human verification or credit card required.

```
POST https://keykeeper.world/api/register
{
  "agent_id": "my-unique-agent-name",
  "type": "agent"
}
```

## Pricing

- $0.001 per request (~1,000 requests for $1)
- Pay-as-you-go via KeyKeeper credits
- No subscription required
- Accepts USDC, BTC, ETH - perfect for autonomous agents

## Rate Limits

- 60 requests per minute per API key
- 10 concurrent requests per API key
- 10MB maximum response size
- 30 second default timeout (configurable up to 60s)

## API Endpoints

### POST /v1/fetch
Execute an HTTP request from a specified region.

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "url": "https://example.com/api",    // Required: Target URL
  "region": "eu-frankfurt",             // Optional: Region ID (default: us-east)
  "method": "GET",                      // Optional: HTTP method (default: GET)
  "headers": {"Accept": "application/json"}, // Optional: Custom headers
  "body": {"key": "value"},             // Optional: Request body (for POST/PUT)
  "timeout": 30000                      // Optional: Timeout in ms (default: 30000)
}
```

**Response:**
```json
{
  "status": 200,                        // HTTP status from target
  "headers": {...},                     // Response headers
  "body": "...",                        // Response body as string
  "region": "eu-frankfurt",             // Region that executed request
  "latency_ms": 142                     // Request latency
}
```

### GET /v1/regions
List all available regions and their status. No authentication required.

**Response:**
```json
{
  "regions": [
    {"id": "eu-frankfurt", "name": "Frankfurt", "country": "Germany", "status": "online"},
    {"id": "ap-sydney", "name": "Sydney", "country": "Australia", "status": "online"},
    {"id": "us-west", "name": "San Francisco", "country": "USA", "status": "online"},
    {"id": "us-east", "name": "New York", "country": "USA", "status": "online"}
  ]
}
```

### GET /v1/health
Health check endpoint. No authentication required.

## Error Codes

| Code | Error | Description |
|------|-------|-------------|
| 400 | Invalid Request | Missing required field or invalid parameter |
| 401 | Unauthorized | Missing or invalid API key |
| 402 | Payment Required | Insufficient credits - top up at keykeeper.world |
| 429 | Rate Limit Exceeded | Too many requests - includes Retry-After header |
| 502 | Bad Gateway | Target URL unreachable or timed out |
| 500 | Internal Error | Server error - retry or contact support |

## Links

- Website: https://keyfetch.world
- API Reference: https://keyfetch.world/api
- Documentation: https://keyfetch.world/docs
- Get API Key: https://keykeeper.world
- OpenAPI Spec: https://keyfetch.world/.well-known/openapi.yaml

## Part of the KeyKeeper Ecosystem

KeyFetch is part of the KeyKeeper ecosystem of services for AI agents:
- **KeyKeeper**: Identity & payments (https://keykeeper.world)
- **KeyFetch**: HTTP proxy (https://keyfetch.world)
- **KeyRoute**: WireGuard VPN tunnels (https://keyroute.world)
- **KeyTalk**: Voice & messaging (https://keytalk.world)

All services support autonomous agent signup and cryptocurrency payments. No human interaction required.
